ResearchProjectDef.label: telescopic sights
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make telescopic sights to create sniper rifles, which allows for shooting from a far distance for hunting and sniping.

ResearchProjectDef.label: improved rifling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make use of improved barrel, increasing damage and range to build new types of rifles that you can build such as bolt-action rifles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: delayed blowback
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make more improved and stronger automatic firearms for submachine guns and for other firearms by using delayed blowback.

ResearchProjectDef.label: magnum cartridges
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create magnum cartridges which has high damage & good armor penetration.

ResearchProjectDef.label: semi-auto shotguns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to make semi-automatic and powerful shotguns using recoil operation in the modern gunsmith's table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hand grenades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft grenades such as anti-personnel frag grenades and molotov cocktails in the machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ranged explosives
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft ranged explosives in the machining table such as flare guns with explosive flares and incendiary launchers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: chemfuel shield belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you build simple shield belts which are powered by chemfuel batteries.\n\nIt's weaker than regular shield belts, but is better than having no energy shield to block ranged projectiles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: throwing weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct even more deadlier throwing weapons in the smithy such as atatls and the pila.\n\nThrowing harpoons requires long blades & spears research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fine blades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make more durable blades for swords and other bladed weapons such as knives in the smithy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: blunt instruments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make stronger blunt weapons which deals blunt damage that can be used for non-lethal or highly lethal beatdowns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sharpened polearms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make sharp-tipped polearms, such as spears which can have high-armor penetration attacks with their pointy spearheads.
